errors.timeout: Timeout exceed. Reload page and try again
errors.unavailableToDownload: Can't reach file. Copy it from

backup.title: Backup
backup.rootfs_warning1: You cannot restore system state using this archives, it just allows you to have a copy of your files
backup.rootfs_warning2: System may run slower while downloading the archive
backup.rootfs_warning3: Rootfs archive does not include files from /mnt/data
